title: #Marboo# - Managing markup language filesw such as Markdown, RST(reStructured Text) and Org-mode, Support Sphinx/Jekyll/Octopress, Writing and previewing Markdown Notes, Edit with external editor such as Emacs, Mou or MacVim, written by @amoblin , Mac App Store download link: http://t.cn/RPcyGVw
description: Marboo是Mac下管理Markdown文件的利器，支持导入Markdown文件夹。支持Markdown、rST(reStructured Text)、Textile、txt2tag等格式的笔记和文件管理。 支持设置编辑器，比如Emacs、Vim、Atom、Sublime Text等，无缝整合静态博客系统如Sphinx/Jekyll/Octopress等。 Markdown文件支持Latex格式公式、表格、代码高亮显示，支持用remark.js格式制作幻灯片。 支持VexTab格式来制作五线谱。
keywords: Markdown, RST, Org-mode, Sphinx, Jekyll, Octopress, Hexo, Emacs, Mou, MacVim, reStructuredText, Note, Preview, Reader, Viewer

coreInfo.title: With Your Favorite Text Editor
coreInfo.subtitle: Support All Text Editor, such as Mou / Vim / Emacs / Sublime Text, etc.

coreInfo.title: Markup Language Support, such as Markdown
coreInfo.subtitle: Inside support Markdown、reStructuredText、Org-mode. With custom script it can support all kinds of markup language.

coreInfo.title: View Notes Easily
coreInfo.subtitle: 3-column UI, Viewing Notes, just like reading RSS in Reeder.

features.title: Security
features.info: All note files is stored in local folder. Without Marboo, accessing the content is available. All Marboo does is responsing your operations with folder.

features.title: Syncing with your pleasure
features.info: Supporting using Dropbox or Git to sync your notes to everywhere.

features.title: Custom Note UI is available
features.info: Modify the main CSS file to custom the UI of all notes.

features.title: Sharing notes in local network
features.info: Tell your friends the note link, the one in the same network can view your note.(Close Sharing? Just restart Marboo)

features.title: Note, Blog，All in one
features.info: Using Marboo to manage files in Jekyll / Octopress / Hexo / Ghost is a smart choice. Notes, Blogs, they are the same. Post to WordPress / Ghost is available!

features.title: Mananging Codes for Coders
features.info: Pygments inside. All kinds of code files can display with syntax highlight.
